title: How to Make Chocolate Mug Cake

steps.headline: Mix well; four tablespoons of flour and sugar.
Add three tablespoons of cocoa powder.
Pour the batter into a microwave safe mug.
steps.description: Make sure you scrape all the sides of your mixing bowl using a rubber spatula. You won't believe how much batter you can add just by doing this!

steps.headline: Microwave for two minutes.
steps.description: If you'd like the cake to melt in your mouth, microwave for one minute.

steps.headline: Remove the mug cake from the microwave.
steps.description: Be careful while doing this, the mug will be hot!

text: Mix well; four tablespoons of flour and sugar.  Add three tablespoons of cocoa powder. Mix well. Add the egg egg. Beat slowly. Add two tablespoons of milk. Mix together thoroughly. Pour the batter into a microwave safe mug. Make sure you scrape all the sides of your mixing bowl using a rubber spatula. You won't believe how much batter you can add just by doing this! Microwave for two minutes. If you'd like the cake to melt in your mouth, microwave for one minute. Remove the mug cake from the microwave. Be careful while doing this, the mug will be hot! Cool and serve!
